title: PBE!!!

embed.description: The Public Beta Environment (PBE) is a limited-access public League of Legends realm where players help us test "declassified" features, content and experiments that aren't yet (and may never be) ready for prime time.

body:
Ok so the link above takes me to the league of legends na pbe account registry. but while there the page will take ages to load and will say " Something went wrong
Was Ziggs here? Something...blew up on this page. Please give it another shot later."
 So with that being said the page also tells me " this site is trying to load scripts and certificates that are not verified" if thats the reason how do i change it?
 And it will tell me "{{Application Error]]" and I dont know whats going on here Riot plz help me :) {{summoner:4}}

replies.body: The PBE signup site is down for maintenance.  I don't have any ETA's on when it will be back up, but we have a [status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) up for updates.  Hang tight!
Just a question, is the PBE thing a first-come-first-serve or a completely random picking?
Great! Thanks. I just saw this and now feel silly about making my post. I'll keep on checking the status page then. I've been super excited since I got the email.
